name: Between The Light And The Dark
name_original: Between The Light And The Dark
description:
There is power between the light and the dark, if you know how to harness it.

Alternate moving between the light and the dark to leave behind a trail of energy in this movement-focused puzzle roguelike.

Remaining in the light or the dark will begin to deplete your energy.

Amass enough energy to manifest inherent powers that trigger at certain energy thresholds.

But, beware- energy is impassable, and your enemies will move to block your progress to try to contain you in the light or the dark forever.

Keys:

[Arrows|WASD|NUMPAD] = Move

[N] = New Game

[H] = Toggle Help

(Made for the 2021 7DRL Challenge)
